meanings.definition: To make (something) popular or well-liked by many people.
meanings.sent1: The new song was popularized by the radio stations.
meanings.sent2: The social media campaign popularized the brand among young adults.
meanings.sent3: The catchy jingle popularized the idea of healthy eating.
meanings.sent4: Her viral video popularized a new dance craze across the country.
meanings.sent5: The celebrity endorsement popularized the fashion trend instantly.

meanings.definition: To bring (something) to the attention of many people.
meanings.sent1: The documentary popularized the issue of climate change.
meanings.sent2: The news article popularized the local charity event.
meanings.sent3: The gossip magazine popularized the rumor about the famous actor.
meanings.sent4: The TV show popularized the concept of time travel in a unique way.
meanings.sent5: The teacher popularized the importance of reading to her students.
